name: NetSpot - WiFi Analyzer
description: NetSpot WiFi analyzer is a sure way to create a flawless wireless network. No matter if you are working on a WiFi coverage at home or your office, use NetSpot WiFi app for Android for the most optimal results. Exceptional simplicity and affordability make NetSpot an all-in-one wireless scanner and WiFi Analyzer. No special knowledge or hardware required.   With NetSpot WiFi Analyzer you can:   Scan your Wi-Fi network and all surrounding wireless networks;  See the data chart changes in real time;  Compare networks by Signal strength and WiFi Channel;  Filter scanned Wi-Fi networks by Name, by Signal strength, by Security protocol, and by Band.  We packed the following features into NetSpot for you:   Live Data: NetSpot collects and visualizes 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac live Wi-Fi data  2.4 and 5GHz Bands: NetSpot supports 2.4GHz and 5GHz channel bands  Details on all APs: Network name, MAC address, Band, Channel, Signal level, Security, etc.  Youll also find NetSpot incredibly useful for:   A quick analysis of all neighboring WiFi networks coverage;  Resolving a WiFi channel overlap conflict;  Locating any issues with WiFi;  Finding signal leakages;  WiFi monitoring;  Troubleshooting and enhancing your networks coverage, capacity, performance, signal level, interference, etc.  Start using NetSpot WiFi analyzer today to prevent any issues with your WiFi in the future!  Feel free to send us your feedback at onair@netspotapp.com and well get back to you as soon as possible.
